OOC: Thanks Inferno731, I would love to take Iferno and Rampage off your 
hands for you!!!!

    Rampage gave a long sigh as he looked in the empty bridge. Being left 
here with an idiot like Inferno was torture....he needed to call someone...
    "Inferno! Get Aracnia on the Comm." He yelled in his gravely voice as he 
took the command chair.
    Inferno shot up from a little nap. "The Royalty! Oh how I have missed 
her!" He said, enthusiastically.
    Rampage grimmaced. He didnt like Aracnia. She knew it and he knew she 
knew it. It didnt matter. At least he would have some intelligent 
conversation.

    Aracnia turned in surprise to the comm station. Aerostreak and Paralysis 
were there, and somewhere Quickstrike and Darkmouse were around. She walked 
up to the comm and found that Rampage wanted her..
    "What dose he want?" She questioned rather coldly. HE claws were on her 
hips in a feminine way.
    Paralysis looked at her, "He wants to rejoin. The ship is ours agian." He 
then turned back to his work.
    Aracnia thought for a moment. "Call Tarantulas and tell him that Kitkat 
and her group can move in here, were going back to the ship!"

    Tarantulas recives the message and turnes to Kitkat. "I have rather good 
news. You can still join us, and have your own base. Ramapge has turned over 
the ship so you can have control of the bunker. It would be wise, this way we 
can control more area."
